com.zpaper.commons

Class S3

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zpaper.commons.S3

  • public class S3
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the zPaper interactions with AWS S3. The design is a static class wrapping a worker class. The static class provides the start, stop, putFile, and getFile methods. The worker class interacts with the AWS S3 service to handle the retries and other possible errors. The worker class also includes the FileDeletion.scheduleDelete(File, Calendar) method call delete files in allfiles when retention > 0 minutes
    References:
    • ErrorBestPractices
    • api-retries
    • request-rate-perf-considerations
    • tuning-the-aws-sdk-for-java-to-improve-resiliency

    2017-09-14 14:45:53,163 [ajp-apr-8009-exec-951] ERROR com.knowledgebin.kb.AllFiles.S3.getFile.S3 - AmazonServiceException outFile: /zpdata/allfiles/131008dc/A1bq/0r4/90e/12147483564-13604626382-101052530-11.pdf s3Path: s3://a0a7000000tm4ejea0.zpaper.com/131008dc/A1bq/0r4/90e/12147483564-13604626382-101052530-11.pdf Error Message: Please reduce your request rate. (Service: Amazon S3; Status Code: 503; Error Code: SlowDown; Request ID: CCA1A01950117CD8) HTTP Status Code: 503 AWS Error Code: SlowDown Error Type: Service Request ID: CCA1A01950117CD8 md: null NOTES: 2017-09-29 #42042 Recognizing that the S3 is a web service and can throttle us affecting the responsiveness to the end user and/or agents we are refactoring this code to be a queued system.
    Following design pattern used for FileDeletion.java, the putFile will now place a file in the ${baseQueuesPath}/S3 with filenames like S3-yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS. A separate thread scans the cached directory for these files, uploads the srcFile to S3, and if successful deletes the S3-yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS file.
    2017-10-08 Refactored to make proper use of Threads and improve debugging output 2017-10-09 Refactored again as I learn more about the proper management of Threads. CMA180727 #50563 Correct errors getFile regarding in fetching files from remote repository and closing streams CMA190114 #56058 Improve handling of non-recoverable AWS S3 errors. CMA190115 #59058 Moved S3 queue out of ${cacheDir} to ${baseQueuesPath}/S3 CMA190929 Moved to zpaper-commons for zippi use. kb and myfileforce must migrate to JDK1.8 and Log4j2 before using CRN190930 Converted from static class to singleton

        public void getFile(String bucketName,
                    String bucketKey,
                    File outFile)
             throws IOException,
                    InterruptedException
        Retrieves a file from S3
        Parameters:
        bucketName - the S3 bucket name
        bucketKey - the S3 bucket item key
        outFile - the file to populate with data
        Throws:
        IOException - exception related to the retrieval and storage of the file
        InterruptedException - return if an interrupt is received during the retrieval of the file

      • putFile

        public void putFile(String bucketName,
                    String bucketKey,
                    File srcFile,
                    int retention)
             throws IOException
        Queue an allfiles file to be written to S3.
        Parameters:
        bucketName - the S3 bucketName
        bucketKey - the S3 buckeyKey
        srcFile - a File referencing the file to be written
        retention - number of minutes to retain the file
        Throws:
        IOException - FileNotFound or other IOException
